content:
M Skelk tried to ride his bike
But alas, he couldn't take a hike
For on his wrist, a band did lay
And it prevented him from pedaling away

He tried to move it up his arm
But the band was tight and caused alarm
So poor M Skelk just had to walk
While his bike stood there, like a useless prop

But fear not, dear M Skelk
For there will come a day, when you can heck
That pesky band that held you back
And pedal away, without any slack

Until then, enjoy the stroll
Take in the sights, let your heart unfold
For even though your bike is still
The world around you, is yours to feel.
